Jingle Jangle Tales. 19. Wolverton, Basil, d. 1978. 20. Powerhouse Pepper. 21. Barks, Carl, 1901- 22. Uncle Scrooge. I. Rosemont, Franklin. II. Cultural Correspondence. Call no.: PN51.C8no.10/11
